550652001.description: The pool with a view is the standout feature of this studio. Featuring free toiletries and bathrobes, this studio includes a private bathroom with a walk-in shower, a bidet and a hairdryer. In the well-fitted kitchen, guests will find a stovetop, a refrigerator, kitchenware and an electric kettle. The air-conditioned studio features a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a private entrance, soundproof walls, a mini-bar as well as garden views. The unit has 1 bed.

cribs_and_extra_beds.text: The price in VND has been converted to show you the approximate price in USD.
Additional fees are not calculated automatically in the total cost and will have to be paid for separately during your stay.
The maximum number of cribs, extra beds, and children allowed in existing beds can vary depending on the option booked.
All cribs and extra beds are subject to availability.

children_at_the_property.text: Children of all ages are welcome.
Children 12 and above are considered adults at this property.
To see correct prices and occupancy info, add the number and ages of children in your group to your search.

550652002.description: This apartment offers a pool with a view. Boasting a private entrance, this air-conditioned apartment includes 1 living room, 1 separate bedroom and 1 bathroom with a walk-in shower and a bidet. In the fully equipped kitchen, guests will find a stovetop, a refrigerator, kitchenware and an electric kettle. This apartment has soundproof walls, flat-screen TV with cable channels, city views, as well as wine/champagne for guests. The unit has 1 bed.

cribs_and_extra_beds.text: The price in VND has been converted to show you the approximate price in USD.
Additional fees are not calculated automatically in the total cost and will have to be paid for separately during your stay.
The maximum number of cribs, extra beds, and children allowed in existing beds can vary depending on the option booked.
All cribs and extra beds are subject to availability.

children_at_the_property.text: Children of all ages are welcome.
Children 12 and above are considered adults at this property.
To see correct prices and occupancy info, add the number and ages of children in your group to your search.

550652003.description: This double room's standout feature is the pool with a view. Offering free toiletries and bathrobes, this double room includes a private bathroom with a walk-in shower, a bidet and a hairdryer. The air-conditioned double room offers a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a private entrance, soundproof walls, a mini-bar as well as garden views. The unit has 1 bed.

children_at_the_property.text: Children of all ages are welcome.
Children 12 and above are considered adults at this property.
To see correct prices and occupancy info, add the number and ages of children in your group to your search.

cribs_and_extra_beds.text: No capacity for extra beds or cribs.
